title: Unusual Fetus: My Baby
alternative_title: Taiji Ihen Watashi no Akachan ; 胎児異変わたしの赤ちゃん
status: Taiji Ihen Watashi no Akachan ; 胎児異変わたしの赤ちゃん
description:
Description :
        A collection of six stories from master of horror Hideshi Hino. In the first story, "Unusual Fetus: My Baby", a horror writer jokes with his pregnant wife about her giving birth to a baby lizard, much to her annoyance. But his joke ends up coming true and alizard baby is born. The writer is horrified and tries to get rid of it, but his wife insists on raising it. From there, an unfortunate and bizarre story begins. The second story, "Flower of Flesh and Blood", was turned into a direct-to-video film in the Guinea Pig series  of movies with Hideshi Hino himself directing. American actor Charlie Sheen one day saw a copy of this film on VHS and contacted the FBI, believing it to be a genuine snuff film...
Contains stories of tragedies and dark comedy.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: Flower Of Flesh And Blood
